item.title: Maintenance Announcement
item.description: We will upgrade app.qfield.cloud to the latest release
item.content: We will upgrade app.qfield.cloud to the latest release

item.title: Degraded service
item.description: Resolved - We believe all users experiencing issues have been able to connect at this time. (05:54 UTC — May 25) Monitoring - We believe the connectivity issues are being caused by an isolated ISP issue. We’ve had reports that swapping to Google DNS servers (see here; https://developers.google.com/speed/public-dns/docs/using) resolves the problem for users. (04:40 UTC — May 25) Investigating We’re aware of reports that users are experiencing some random problems. We’re currently investigating these issues, and apologize for any inconvenience it may be causing you.
item.content:
Resolved -

We believe all users experiencing issues have been able to connect at this time. (05:54 UTC — May 25)

Monitoring -

We believe the connectivity issues are being caused by an isolated ISP issue. We’ve had reports that swapping to Google DNS servers (see here; https://developers.google.com/speed/public-dns/docs/using) resolves the problem for users. (04:40 UTC — May 25)

Investigating

  • We’re aware of reports that users are experiencing some random problems. We’re currently investigating these issues, and apologize for any inconvenience it may be causing you. (16:55 UTC — Jan 30)
